articles.author: F1
articles.title: Sainz storms to victory amid drama in Australia - Formula 1
articles.description: Ferrari driver Carlos Sainz took the first non-Red Bull win of the season with an impressive display during Sunday’s Australian Grand Prix, taking advantage of technical trouble for Max Verstappen in the opening laps that forced the reigning world champion to…
articles.content: But with DRS in play after just one lap, Sainz used the overtaking aid to close in on Verstappen and send the crowd wild with a move on the run between Turns 9 and 10 taking advantage of a really wei… [+1077 chars]
